Parameters: List: The list of available services.
onStreamingServicesUpdated(java.util.Lis.Description: Called to indicate published Streaming Services have changed. This will only be called after the application has requested a list of streaming services and specified a service class list of interest AND the results of a subsequent getStreamServices call with the same service class list would return different results.

onMiddlewareReady().Description: Called to indicate that the middleware has been initialized and is ready. Before this method is called, calling any method on an instance of @B_android#telephony#MbmsStreamingSession_E@ will result in an @B_java#lang#IllegalStateException_E@ or an error delivered via @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsStreamingSessionCallback#onError_E@ with error code @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#GeneralErrors#ERROR_MIDDLEWARE_NOT_YET_READY_E@.

Parameters: String: A human-readable message generated by the middleware for debugging purposes. This value may be null.
onError(int, java.lang.String).Description: Called by the middleware when it has detected an error condition. The possible error codes are listed in @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors_E@.
onError(int, java.lang.String).FullName: public void onError (int errorCode, String message)

Parameters: int: The error code. Value is @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#ERROR_NO_UNIQUE_MIDDLEWARE_E@, @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#ERROR_MIDDLEWARE_LOST_E@, @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#ERROR_MIDDLEWARE_NOT_BOUND_E@, @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#InitializationErrors#ERROR_APP_PERMISSIONS_NOT_GRANTED_E@, @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#InitializationErrors#ERROR_DUPLICATE_INITIALIZE_E@, @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#InitializationErrors#ERROR_UNABLE_TO_INITIALIZE_E@, @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#GeneralErrors#ERROR_MIDDLEWARE_NOT_YET_READY_E@, @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#GeneralErrors#ERROR_OUT_OF_MEMORY_E@, @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#GeneralErrors#ERROR_MIDDLEWARE_TEMPORARILY_UNAVAILABLE_E@, @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#GeneralErrors#ERROR_IN_E911_E@, @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#GeneralErrors#ERROR_NOT_CONNECTED_TO_HOME_CARRIER_LTE_E@, @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#GeneralErrors#ERROR_UNABLE_TO_READ_SIM_E@, @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#GeneralErrors#ERROR_CARRIER_CHANGE_NOT_ALLOWED_E@, @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#StreamingErrors#ERROR_CONCURRENT_SERVICE_LIMIT_REACHED_E@, @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#StreamingErrors#ERROR_UNABLE_TO_START_SERVICE_E@, or @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#StreamingErrors#ERROR_DUPLICATE_START_STREAM_E@
String: A human-readable message generated by the middleware for debugging purposes. This value may be null.
onError(int,java.lang.String).Description: Called by the middleware when it has detected an error condition. The possible error codes are listed in @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors_E@.
onError(int,java.lang.String).FullName: public void onError (int errorCode, String message)

ClassDesc: A callback class that is used to receive information from the middleware on MBMS streaming services. An instance of this object should be passed into @B_android#telephony#MbmsStreamingSession#create_E@.
